scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test lerna run migrations:up:test && yarn test:all
scripts.test:all: cross-env NODE_ENV=test yarn workspace @persona/entities run test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test yarn workspace @persona/app run test
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development lerna run migrations:up:dev && lerna run dev --parallel
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production lerna run migrations:up && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
